Name: EDEN: Create World
About the game: EDEN is a physical sandbox. No limits, create worlds and play the way you want! To create worlds, we give you a large set of tools, game mechanics, smart and not so smart NPCs, cars, weapons and many other interesting things. You have access to creative and game modes of the game, in which you can team up with other players or create worlds alone, as well as play already created ones by connecting to any of the servers. No limits - create games and play the way you want!
